response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for us. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is a unique chance to secure a high-quality item at a competitive rate. I believe this price aligns well with the value you perceive in the product, making it a win-win situation for both of us. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 12000}
